ygData.subject: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you having fun playing your 21st shaman? If so then you (jackal) have plenty of things to do to keep you occupied until the expansion comes out. Your
ygData.messageBody:
Are you having fun playing your 21st shaman? If so then you (jackal) have
plenty of things to do to keep you occupied until the expansion comes out.
Your shaman still has to suffer from all the problems with the game that IMO
need to get fixed. If you don't have fun playing anything but your 50 necro
then thats a different story.

Galtin of E'ci

> I know but then again us 50's played with less then you have now you guys
> just want some new stuff I just need a place to hunt and I've got a 21
> shaman right now. There is plenty of places to hunt and there are quests
> here and there but the bottom line is you guys can play it's getting to
> be
> unplayable now to wherem ost people don't pla ytheir main chars at all or
> rarely rather because of overcrowding. This is the problem I am forced to
> play my mid level chars so there must be something right for you guys.
>
>
>
>
